statements: DELETE FROM centralized_logging_system WHERE service_name = 'billing' AND log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM centralized_logging_system WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';
DELETE FROM cloud_service_logs WHERE log_id = 123 AND log_type = 'Error'
DELETE FROM log_analysis WHERE analysis_id IN (SELECT analysis_id FROM log_analysis WHERE analysis_result = 'Suspicious')
DELETE FROM cloud_service_logs WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM log_analysis WHERE analysis_result = 'Failed')
DELETE FROM AuthenticationLogs WHERE user_id = 123 AND auth_status = 'failed';
DELETE FROM CloudServiceMetrics WHERE metric_id IN (SELECT metric_id FROM CloudServiceMetrics WHERE metric_value < 0);
DELETE FROM CloudServiceErrors WHERE error_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
